Title: Two Piece Prom Evening Gown

Category: formal-gowns, quinceanera

Featured-image: CP811-fuchsia-two-piece-prom-evening-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: A flirty two piece look with a halter top and an open back. The bodice is beaded with colorful beads that are designed to create a young fresh look. The open midriff is flirtatious and the satin skirt is full and falls to the floor with a slight pleating.
